items.text: length on the pads, uses the pace to tickle it to fine leg and beats the man to his left
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: full and angled across, driven to mid-off's left for one
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Jeremiah: "surprised to see a misjudged run become the downfall of this partnership. These two have played with each other for a little over 12 years AND played in the same academy growing up. They've sometimes been the reason for some of B'deshs best wins. NZ with a gift of a wicket."
items.text: length on middle, he shuffles across and nudges it towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: anubhav: "It was in the gap shakib should have responded better with clear yes or no...what a waste of a important wicket after getting over important peroid of the match"
items.text: length angled in from pretty wide, straightens a little and induces the outside edge that runs down to third-man for two
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: quicker one on middle, stays back and defends to cover
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length, drifting in, nudged towards square leg
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full and angled in, clears his front leg and pushes it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: shorter length, same line, pushes it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, driven hard but straight to cover
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: naser: "With mushi gone, this is real test for BD's middle order. there focus now will be shifted towards more around 260 than scoring 300 +..."
items.text: length outside off from around the wicket, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short and angled in, doesn't rise and Shakib helps it along with the angle, rolls his wrists to keep it along the ground to deep square leg's right for two
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: length outside off, pushed to deep cover-point for one
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length and angled in, quick deliver, Mithun followed it with his hands a little bit, just misses his glove
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: another one misdirected and down the leg side
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: another one down the leg side, this time to a plan with a leg gully in place from around the wicket, the batsman walks across and tries to nudge it away and misses. Called wide
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: angled across from around the wicket, fuller length, defended
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: another quick one, banged hard into the surface, defended to the leg side with a loose bottom hand
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short and cracked away for four He was lightning quick to get into position there and hammered it in front of square and into the boundary after a couple of bounces
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: length around middle and leg, skips down the wicket and pushes it to long-on
items.shortText: Santner to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length, angled in, tucked away to square leg's left for one
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, Shakib rocks back and gets on top of the bounce to cut it past point for three as the fielder from deep point keeps the ball in play with a slide
items.shortText: Santner to Shakib Al Hasan, 3 runs

items.text: full outside off, driven to deep cover
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: quicker one, angled across, Shakib slaps it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Santner to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg for one
items.shortText: Santner to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
